title: Witch hunt
brief_description: Presented by George Donikan, this documentary is a “Four Corners” style investigation into the so-called Greek Social Security Conspiracy Fraud. The whole story of the scandal and the role of the Federal Police and the Department of Social Security is explored in this documentary.
